channel.description: Recent content in msys2 on xin iDEA iNNATA

item.title: Some works after Windows 10 clean installation
item.description: Activation of your Windows 10 Open the cmd of Windows. slmgr -ipk {your product key} slmgr -skms {kms server address of your company} slmgr -ato Installation of some useful tools Msys2 AutoHotKey Ricty Configuration of msys2 pacman -S git fish tmux emacs gcc python cd ~ git clone https://github.com/xinii/xinconfig .xinconfig cd .xinconfig .
